name: Tank 2021: Laser Guns
description:
Totally not a tank 1990 - Battle City rip off. Also it's 2021 so tanks have laser guns because normal ammunition can't penetrate today's tank armor. The problem is... you need connection with the tower in order to shoot and as advanced as it is, it only can travel by air which means that it cannot through walls and stuff.  I need sleep so.... good luck player!

Cover art : GrimGlory
